participant_1.background:
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.
I'd like to be reincarnated as a dragon, so I could continue to protect my friends and fight for what is right.
I like to dress up to express my personality and creativity.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.

participant_2.background:
I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.
i like things that explode.
When I want a sweet treat, I enjoy a pear.
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.
I love finding little things in the woods to add to my collection.

content.text: What did you do for your birthday?
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.
That sounds really fun! What kind of train set does he have?
Oh, it's a really big one. It goes around the entire basement!
I've always wanted to play with a big train set! That sounds so cool.
It is really fun! I love playing with it when I go visit my poppa.
What else did you do for your birthday?
I also ate my favorite foods and listened to Taylor Swift's music.
Oh, what are some of your favorite foods?
I like a lot of different foods, but my favorite is probably pizza.
Pizza is really good! I love it with pepperoni and mushrooms.
Me too! I also love it with olives and onions.
Oh, I've never tried olives on pizza. I'll have to try that sometime.
